channel.title: Lumbridge - the one to rule them all
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/InCbT.jpg[/img][/center]
The base I have chosen is Shard, only because it's stable and I like the way it is built. I am trying to get the server to be exactly like 2004-2007 type RuneScape. There will be no "newer" items. My first, and most important priority at the moment are: skills. Once I get them all working, it should be smooth sailing from then on.
I am currently looking for ONE person to team up with for this project so that the process is a bit faster. Why one? I still want to learn as much as I can, instead of having a huge team. If you're interested, you must have a mind set on getting this server as close as possible as 2004-2007 type RuneScape. PM me if interested.
* [b]Quests[/b] o Tutorial Island o Black Knight's Fortress o Cook's Assistant o Demon Slayer o Doric's Quest o Dragon Slayer o Ernest the Chicken o Goblin Diplomacy o Imp Catcher o The Knights Sword o Pirate's Treasure o Prince Ali Rescue o The Restless Ghost o Romeo & Juliet o Rune Mysteries o Sheep Shearer o Shield of Arrav o Vampire Slayer o Witch's Potion
* [b]Skills[/b] o Agility o Construction o Cooking o Crafting o Farming o Firemaking o Fishing o Fletching o Herblore o Mining o Prayer o Runecrafting o Slayer o Smithing o Thieving o Woodcutting
* [b]Combat[/b] o Melee o Magic o Range
* [b]Other[/b] o Quest Handler
[size=14pt][b]Images:[/b][/size]
[img]http://i54.tinypic.com/i50r40.png[/img]
Fishing [img]http://i.imgur.com/s9JVg.png[/img]
Mining [img]http://i.imgur.com/ouY37.png[/img]
Woodcutting [img]http://i.imgur.com/IUZFf.png[/img]
459 Gameframe [img]http://i.imgur.com/PM6Mc.png[/img]
Website [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Fr9f8.jpg[/img]
[size=14pt][b]Support This Project:[/b][/size] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/InCbT.jpg[/img] Please link the image to this thread.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4wdqY.jpg[/img] Please link the image to this thread.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/VIkRt.jpg[/img] Please link the image to this thread.
:)

item.title: Lumbridge - the one to rule them all
item.dc:creator: @xxxxxx_13 xxxxxx 13
item.description:
@xxxxxx_13 wrote:

I wish you luck on creating an efficient and powerful magic script. There have been good ones but i have yet to see a great full magic system. You can disagree but magic has always been a bit of a disappointment…on EVERY server source, don’t even get me started when it comes to magic on framework sources. But honestly though, develop that. And you’ll have my props.

Read full topic

item.title: Lumbridge - the one to rule them all
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“Liquid Magic, post:56, topic:382381”]Just stop. Your posts are completely useless and they are not helping. All I see is a bunch of arrogant douche bags making assumptions pulled out of their asses. No body likes their development thread being attacked because the developer is a 12 year-old kid trying to experiment with a game. If any of you were mature, you’d stop asking the OP to end the argument and do it yourself.

P.S: 90% of the people on here have no right to be putting down on other’s regarding their programming skills because you are just as bad.

P.S.S: Don’t reply to this.[/quote]
I will reply to this if I want to; and if you actually read the topic you would know he was getting flamed for his attitude, not programming skill.

Read full topic

item.title: Lumbridge - the one to rule them all
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

zay331:

I Vain I, get off my ass and care about your own server. I know that you don’t like others competing against you since we’re both aiming for the same thing.

HEY! No one is allowed to talk to Old Man Vain like that except me!

Get your head out of your ass and show some respect; posting a two second comment isn’t stopping you from posting progress pictures.

Don’t be ignorant, especially to the Senior/Respected members; if you don’t like what someone is saying, ignore it, and if you don’t want to ignore it, your stay at the Mopar hotel won’t be very pleasent.
